original_title: Saur Sepuh IV: Titisan Darah Biru
overview: Brama Kumbara (Denny Porlen)  is preparing for eternity  through an ascetic cleansing. Meanwhile, the Madangkara  Kingdom has been handed over to his daughter, Wanapati (Agus Kuncoro). The people of Kuntala, who have greeted this news with delight, prepare to take revenge on Madangkara, where the ambitions of the young merchants and the instigation of riots are splitting the kingdom apart. The forces still faithful to Brama come to ask him for advice.
title: Saur Sepuh IV: The Blue Blood Offspring
